mapper.select: select MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_URL, UPPER_MENU_ID, MENU_ORDER, CRE_DT, CRE_USER, MOD_DT, MOD_USER from WISETM_MENU_INFO order by UPPER_MENU_ID desc, MENU_ORDER, MENU_NAME
mapper.insert: insert into WISETM_MENU_INFO( MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_URL, UPPER_MENU_ID, MENU_ORDER, CRE_DT, CRE_USER ) values( #{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{menuUrl}, #{upperMenuId}, #{menuOrder}, sysdate, #{creUser} )
mapper.update: update WISETM_MENU_INFO set MENU_NAME = #{menuName}, MENU_URL = #{menuUrl}, UPPER_MENU_ID = #{upperMenuId}, MENU_ORDER = #{menuOrder}, MOD_DT = sysdate, MOD_USER = #{modUser} where MENU_ID = #{menuId}
